574110.name: LoveBeat - Standard Clown Pack
574110.description:
Happy Halloween 2019! This pack contains exclusive Halloween items, including the clown costume. Let's dress up as a clown and play pranks!

[Contents]

It contains all of the following items:

* Clown Costume (30days)
- It includes everything you need to become a clown from head to toe!
- This pack contains the clown face, costume and accessory for all the body types, but you cannot receive items of the opposite sex.

* VIP Room, Halloween Night (7days)
- Creepy Halloween Night! You can change your waiting room to the Halloween room.
- It gives you the following buffs - EXP+75%, Beat+75%, Love+50% - in using the room.

* 50000 Beat
- Beat is one of in-game currencies that can be used in various ways such as buying in-game items.

[Note]

1. You can view the DLC which you buy at in-game DLC page (Click “View My Information” > Click a down arrow button at the bottom left of the information page(diary)).
2. The pack is delivered to your inbox when you click a "Not Received" button at in-game DLC page above.
3. Items are deleted without any prior notice if you don't receive them from your inbox in their retention period.
